function.name: hera_get_device_id
function.description: Retrieve the system ID for a device using its common name or descriptive reference

device_reference.description: How the device is commonly referred to (name, location, or descriptive phrase)

function.name: hera_get_system_summary
function.description: Get a summary of all devices registered to this home automation system

function.name: hera_get_device_description
function.description: Get a human-readable description of a device, including its capabilities, states, and available actions

device_id.description: The unique system ID of the device to be described

function.name: hera_read_temperature
function.description: Reads the current temperature value for the requested zone

zone_name.description: Name of the zone for which the temperature value is checked

function.name: hera_read_humidity
function.description: Reads the current humidity value for the requested zone

zone_name.description: Name of the zone for which the humidity value is checked

function.name: hera_read_sensors
function.description: Get readings from all sensors in the requested zone or the entire system if the zone is not specified

zone_name.description: The name of the zone from which the sensors data will be retrieved; if the user request does not provide the zone, 'system' is used

function.name: hera_start_heating
function.description: Activates the central heating system to begin warming the home

function.name: hera_stop_heating
function.description: Completely disables the central heating system, halting all heating operations

function.name: hera_get_heating_state
function.description: Retrieves the current state of the central heating system

function.name: hera_run_diagnose
function.description: Verify that the requested device is online and working properly, and create a diagnostic report; diagnose the entire system if a device is not provided by the user request

device_id.description: The unique ID of the device to be diagnosed; use 'system' if the device is not provided by the user request
